author: cms-sw
body: As requested https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48481 , this change will setup new CMSSW_13_2_HLT_X IBs. It will use its dedicated CMSSW_13_2_HLT_X branch of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw. Changes from CMSSW_13_2_X will be automatically forward ported to CMSSW_13_2_HLT_X  branch
title: Setup CMSSW_13_2_HLT_X IBs
